title: [Large-Scale] Social Justice Pedagogy Blended Learning Program for Social Work Professional Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social welfare theory and field experience
context.additional_context: Targets medical/legal/technical professionals, utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners analyze structural inequality cases in social welfare settings through VR simulations and propose critical solutions.
In blended learning environments, learners apply core principles of social justice pedagogy (power relationship analysis, hegemony critique) to real-world cases for discussion.
Under technological constraints such as the digital divide, learners design social change strategies using smartphone-based collaborative tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
